title: Drawing, "Cloud-capped South American Mountain Landscape Seen Beside a Bay, Part 1?", 1853, probably May
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper left:  2-  Mountains capped with clouds / 3-  Portions of rock seen
description: Horizontal cloud-capped mountain landscape, with outcropping of a large rock at center, beside the bank of a bay containing a tree in the right lateral foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Cloud-capped South American Mountain Landscape Seen Beside a Bay, Part 1?", 1853, probably May.
1853, probably May. Graphite on light gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-414.
